snippet: Alex Morgan scored as the United States’ women’s national team defeated Switzerland, 3-0, in group play at the Algarve Cup in Portugal.
abstract: United States women's national soccer team defeats Switzerland, 3-0, at Algarve Cup soccer tournament; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Alex Morgan scored as the United States’ women’s national team defeated Switzerland, 3-0, in group play at the Algarve Cup in Portugal.

headline.main: U.S. Women Beat Switzerland at Algarve Cup
